summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6123 for the improvement of 14th Avenue West, westerly roadway, from West Armour Street to West Barrett Street; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85050, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
